# cook your dish here
n=int(input())
s=list(map(int,input().split()))
su=0
for i in s:
    su+=i

an=(n)*(n+1)//2
if(an==su):
    print("YES")

else:
    print("NO")

# cook your dish here
l = []
n = int(input())
x = map(int, input().split())
x1 = sum(x)
for i in range(1, n+1):
    l.append(i)

l1 = sum(l)
if x1 == l1:
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")

# cook your dish here
l=list()
n=int(input())
x=[int(item) for item in input().split()]
sum1=sum(x)
j=1
while n:
    l.append(j)
    j=j+1
    n=n-1
if sum1==sum(l)    :
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")

# cook your dish here
import math
n=int(input())
l=list(map(int,input().split()))
s=sum(l)
z=math.trunc(math.sqrt(1+8*s))
z=(-1+z)//2
if z==n:
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")

n = int(input())
arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
s1 = sum(arr)
s2 = n * (n+1) / 2
if s1 == s2:
    print('YES')
else:
    print('NO')

n = int(input())

L = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

s = sum(L)

if s == n*(n+1)//2:
    print('YES')

else:
    print('NO')

# cook your dish here
t=int(input())
a=list(map(int,input().split()))[:t]
b=(t*(t+1))//2
c=sum(a)
if(b==c):
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")
